word:
Christ was surrounded by his disciples, and a vast 

                         - 10 - 

congregation were listening to his words when he said, "Take heed to yourselves, lest at any time your hearts be overcharged with surfeiting, and drunkenness, and the cares of this life, and so that day come upon you unawares." "Let him that thinketh he standeth take heed lest he fall."
